summary: A clumsy, accident-prone taxicab driver, who invented the elastic-glass, risks losing his valuable invention to a group of con-men led by a crooked lawyer but the pretty lady-owner of the Yellow Cab Co. comes to his aid.
cast: Red Skelton|Gloria DeHaven|Walter Slezak|Edward Arnold|James Gleason|Jay C. Flippen|Paul Harvey|Herbert Anderson|John Butler|John Indrisano|Polly Moran|Jessie Arnold|William Bailey|Michael Barrett|Margaret Bert|Gladys Blake|Bert Block|Jack Boyle|John Bradley|Chet Brandenburg|Tex Brodus|Douglas Carter|Sue Casey|Mack Chandler|Dick Cherney|Naomi Childers|Russ Clark|Mae Clarke|Tom Coleman|Jack Daley|Frank Darien|Bert Davidson|Helen Dickson|Lester Dorr|Mary Jo Ellis|Estelle Etterre|Arthur 'Weegee' Fellig|Sam Fisher|Jody Gilbert|Beatrice Gray|Frank Hagney|George Hoagland|Charles Anthony Hughes|Marjorie Jackson|Michael Jeffers|Tiny Jones|Nikki Juston|Donald Kerr|Kay Koury|Charles Lane|Nolan Leary|Peggy Leon|Edith Leslie|Margie Liszt|Kay Mansfield|Harry Mayo|May McAvoy|Walter Merrill|Ralph Montgomery|Roger Moore|Charles Murray Jr.|Fred Murray|Monty O'Grady|Anne O'Neal|Garry Owen|Eddie Parker|Ralph Peters|Lee Phelps|Joe Ploski|Tom Quinn|Allan Ray|Danny Richards Jr.|Dewey Robinson|Jeffrey Sayre|Frank J. title: The Yellow Cab Man
